Name: Imagine Lifetimes
About the game: A satirical point-and-click simulation game about the meaning of life. Born with the ability to choose, your actions and decisions shape the paths ahead of you. Face the inevitable through a series of life-changing predicaments as you choose your way to the end... Features Explore a variety of meaningless choices, paths and endings Choose wisely, every choice has the potential to affect your lifetime Question the absurdity of existence as you figure out what it means to be alive WARNING: May contain traces of irony, nihilism and dark humor.
